title: Swine card
data:
{{Version028}}
{{flavour|The card depicts several feral hogs wallowing in a mud pit.}}
The Swine card [[Polymorph|polymorphs]] the player into a [[hog]].

==History==
The Swine card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] over the past several versions.
